name: Dungeon Mania - RPG Offline!
description:
Gameplay features:
- Plot & Story
- Non-linear dialogues
- Roguelike
- Action RPG
- Hack & slash
- Dungeon crawling
- 3D game
- Epic battles
- Rpg offline
- Gold search
- Gems collecting
- Chests
- Arena

Non-game features:
- NO ADS
- 3D
- Offline
- Minimum application size
- Stunning 3D graphics
- No long and extra downloads

Interface features:
- Classic RPG style
- Intuitive graphic symbols
- Classic RPG arrangement of elements
- Plot, story and dialogues
